A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I'm gonna give it a middle score\, because it was \"okay\".The first third of the movie was definitely worth just 1 star for its excessive use of jokes and far too light of a tone for a SW movie\, but it got better as it progressed. My biggest gripes with this movie\, however: No balls to let characters die where it seems right and fitting; missed out on some much better dark story lines and character deveoplemtn\, instead opting for more neutral-grey and heroism.
